metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3621 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified asproblematic. Affected is the function nilfs_bmap_lookup_at_level of thefile fs/nilfs2/inode.c of the component nilfs2. The manipulation leads tonull pointer dereference. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. Itis recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-211920.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needed').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
